title: Advise on Tax-Loss Harvesting
description: An investor has significant capital gains for the year and wants to sell some losing investments to offset those gains.

tasks.description: Calculate the investor's total realized capital gains for the year to date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the amount of gains that need to be offset.

tasks.description: Identify investments in the portfolio with unrealized losses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds suitable stocks to sell at a loss.

tasks.description: Advise the client on which investments to sell to generate losses, while also explaining the 'wash sale' rule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a specific strategy to offset gains while complying with all rules.
